Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of the 2nd Ḥm-ntr priest of Amun T3i-nfr with black painted detail: a striated lappet-wig tied with a fillet, a modelled face and crossed arms in relief holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Government of the British Protectorate of Egypt
